# NETWORK::NETWORK_SESSION_SET_MATCHMAKING_MENTAL_STATE

## Summary
Setup a matchmaking mental state. Use this to prefer to include sessions with roughly the same average mental state of the players

## Parameters
* **INT** mentalState

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
p0 in the decompiled scripts is always the stat mesh_texblend * 0.07 to int
